_**User (2026-01-22 23:45Z)**_

---

_**Agent (model copilot/claude-sonnet-4.5)**_

U≈æivatel ≈ô√≠k√°, ≈æe obsah st√°le p≈ôesahuje jednu str√°nku A4. Mus√≠m zkr√°tit obsah tak, aby se ve≈°el na jednu stranu A4. Zmen≈°√≠m rozmƒõry, mezery a velikosti font≈Ø, aby se v≈°e ve≈°lo.

A4 m√° rozmƒõry 210mm √ó 297mm. S okraji 10mm m√°m k dispozici cca 190mm √ó 277mm. Probl√©m je pravdƒõpodobnƒõ v tom, ≈æe obsah je p≈ô√≠li≈° vysok√Ω.

Mus√≠m:
1. Zmen≈°it celkov√© padding v .flyer
2. Zmen≈°it mezery mezi sekcemi (margins)
3. Mo≈æn√° zmen≈°it nƒõkter√© fonty
4. Odstranit nebo zmen≈°it dekorativn√≠ ƒç√°ry
5. Zmen≈°it padding v price-section a features

Pod√≠v√°m se na kl√≠ƒçov√© v√Ω≈°kov√© prvky:
- padding flyer: 15mm top + 15mm bottom = 30mm
- header margin-bottom: 8mm + padding-bottom: 5mm = 13mm
- main-title margin: 8mm + 8mm = 16mm
- subtitle margin: 5mm + 5mm = 10mm
- description margin: 8mm + 8mm = 16mm
- decorative-line margin: 5mm + 5mm + height 2px = ~10mm
- price-section margin: 10mm + 10mm = 20mm, padding: 8mm + 8mm = 16mm
- features margin: 8mm + 8mm = 16mm
- footer margin-top: 8mm, padding-top: 5mm = 13mm

To je hodnƒõ. Mus√≠m v√Ωraznƒõ zredukovat mezery.

---
